response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe could significantly enhance your business or personal endeavors. This product holds immense value to me, but I am confident it can bring even greater benefits to someone like yourself who can truly appreciate its capabilities and potential.

I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This represents a substantial discount compared to its market value, reflecting my desire to find the right person who can make the most of its features and contribute to its full potential.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product. I am more than happy to provide additional details or arrange for a demonstration to help you understand its true value.

Looking forward to your response,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
